___runMode.description:
Determines the run mode of the Azure Webjob. 

 Triggered: manually triggered 
 Scheduled: runs on a specific schedule 
 Continuous: runs all the time

Determines the run mode of the Azure Webjob. 

 Triggered: manually triggered 
 Scheduled: runs on a specific schedule 
 Continuous: runs all the time

title: JSON schema for Azure Webjobs configuration files

___endTime.description: The end time of a scheduled job. Example. 2014-06-12T00:00:00-08:00

___interval.description: The interval of how often the Azure Webjob should run. Use it with the 'jobRecurrenceFrequency' property.

___startTime.description: The start time of a scheduled job. Example. 2014-06-11T00:00:00-08:00

___webJobName.description: The name of the Azure Webjob.

___jobRecurrenceFrequency.description: The frequency metric used with the 'interval' property.

___runMode.description:
Determines the run mode of the Azure Webjob. 

 Triggered: manually triggered 
 Scheduled: runs on a specific schedule 
 Continuous: runs all the time
